Head: Sick headache; pain in forehead and temples, moving to occiput
Pressure from within outward, with stretching and yawning and pain down back
Tongue swollen and much saliva
Extremities: Pain in back, thighs, elbows, shoulders

name: Menispermum
details: A remedy for megrim, associated with restlessness and dreams. Pain in spine. Dryness, itching all over. Dry mouth and throat.
